channel.title: Changing Xp Rates [DEVO]
channel.description: hey im using a [color=blue]devo[/color] source and i need to change the xp rates, i searched all over client.java and there is nothing there from what i can see to change xp rates, if anybody could help i would be thankfull :)

item.title: Changing Xp Rates [DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @reventix reventix
item.description:
@reventix wrote:

Nope, i dont think it is Final Devolution, when i got it it was just called Devolution. i think it was by Legacy508. this is totally different to any other server "/

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Xp Rates [DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @XMikEIX XMikEIX
item.description:
@XMikEIX wrote:

If you’re using Final Devolution, follow theese steps.

  1. Open client.java
  2. After the imports you should see a SERVER_EXPERIENCE and some number after it.
  3. Change that number to what experience you wanna have, you need to think about 1 thing though.

If you change the experience to a 5, you will get 20xp per hit, change to a 10, you get 40, change to 20 you get 80 and so on. I’m using same source and I set it to 200. (800xp/hit)

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Xp Rates [DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

open client.java and search for TotalExp = (double)

you should see something like this : TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff);

2000 is the xp just change it

then search againd and change it and againd and againd until you cant find anymore

Read full topic
